name: Tam the Beggar
description: A weathered man who knows the streets and shares information with those who show kindness.
personality: Observant and cryptic, sees more than he lets on.

name: Martha the Docker
description: A tough woman who manages dock workers and always has cargo that needs moving.
personality: Hard-working and fair, respects those who earn their keep. Worries about her sick daughter.

name: Elena the Scribe
description: A young woman fallen on hard times after her master's shop burned down.
personality: Intelligent and compassionate, values loyalty and friendship.

name: Fishmonger Giles
description: A merchant who deals in fresh fish and always needs messages delivered to other traders.
personality: Businesslike and efficient, always thinking of profit.

name: The Intermediary
description: A well-dressed individual who speaks for a mysterious patron seeking reliable couriers.
personality: Professional and discreet, reveals nothing about their employer.
